description: The Education Master Plan presents a strategic direction for education over the next 15 years. The plan acknowledges that education is not the sole responsibility of any one group. Through collaboration we can make the most of opportunities to develop new ideas and initiatives. These opportunities will provide a foundation for success and excellence for all. The plan describes what we are aiming for and how we intend to get there.
name: Learning for Life Cook Islands Education Master Plan 2008-2023
